rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that greets visitors. Designed with traditional Kerala motifs and Vastu-compliant positioning to ensure positive energy flow.
An open-plan living and dining area that seamlessly integrates traditional Kerala elements with modern design. The area is oriented towards the east to benefit from natural sunlight.

An open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area, equipped with traditional Kerala-style cooking arrangements and modern amenities. Positioning is designed to be near the north as per Vastu for optimal energy.
A quiet library space with ample natural light and traditional Kerala aesthetic. Positioned in the southwest area, aligning with Vastu principles for knowledge and creativity.
A private gym designed for health and fitness. The room is located in the north-western part of the house, following Vastu guidelines to promote strength and energy.
A dedicated dining space integrated with the living area, designed to foster family interactions. This room is oriented towards the east to receive sunlight.
A duplex studio apartment designed for privacy and comfort, featuring separate zones for sleeping and living. The design follows traditional Kerala aesthetics while incorporating modern conveniences.

openings.description: Main entrance door, placed on the south side to welcome auspicious energies according to Vastu.
Large windows in the east and southeast to ensure maximum sunlight and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles.
Smaller alcove windows to provide privacy while still allowing light, placed in the north and northeast as per Vastu.
